languages.text: У персонажа, спрятавшегося за укрытием, есть шанс избежать вражеских {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционных{/g} атак. Полные укрытия, обозначенные черепом на щите, уменьшают {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}шанс попадания{/g} в персонажа на 60%. Частичные — на 35%. При этом шанс попасть в персонажа за укрытием может меняться в зависимости от выбранной вами сложности игры, а также под действием некоторых {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талантов{/g} и эффектов.
languages.original_text: A character hiding behind cover has a chance to avoid enemy ranged attacks. Full covers, indicated by a skull on the shield, reduce the chance of hitting the character by 60%. Partial covers reduce the same chance by 35%. At the same time, the chance to hit a character behind cover may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose, as well as under the influence of certain abilities, talents and effects.

traits.locale_text:
Персонаж, спрятавшийся за укрытием, имеет шанс избежать вражеских дальнобойных атак.
Полные укрытия, обозначенные черепом на щите, уменьшают шанс попадания в персонажа на 60%. Частичные — на 35%. При этом шанс попасть в персонажа за укрытием может меняться в зависимости от выбранной вами сложности игры, а также под действием некоторых способностей, талантов и эффектов.

Персонаж, спрятавшийся за укрытием, имеет шанс избежать вражеских дальнобойных атак.
Полные укрытия, обозначенные черепом на щите, уменьшают шанс попадания в персонажа на 60%. Частичные — на 35%. При этом шанс попасть в персонажа за укрытием может меняться в зависимости от выбранной вами сложности игры, а также под действием некоторых способностей, талантов и эффектов.

languages.text: A character hiding behind cover has a chance to avoid enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks. Full cover, indicated by a skull on the shield, reduce the chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the character by 60%. Partial cover reduces the chance to hit by 35%. Although, the chance to hit a character behind cover may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose and can be altered by certain {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, and effects.
languages.original_text: У персонажа, спрятавшегося за укрытием, есть шанс избежать вражеских {g|Encyclopedia:Range}дистанционных{/g} атак. Полные укрытия, обозначенные черепом на щите, уменьшают {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}шанс попадания{/g} в персонажа на 60%. Частичные — на 35%. При этом шанс попасть в персонажа за укрытием может меняться в зависимости от выбранной вами сложности игры, а также под действием некоторых {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талантов{/g} и эффектов.

traits.locale_text: A character hiding behind cover has a chance to avoid enemy ranged attacks. Full cover, indicated by a skull on the shield, reduce the chance to hit the character by 60%. Partial cover reduces the chance to hit by 35%. Although, the chance to hit a character behind cover may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose and can be altered by certain abilities, talents, and effects.

A character hiding behind cover has a chance to avoid enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks. Full cover, indicated by a skull on the shield, reduce the chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the character by 60%. Partial cover reduces the chance to hit by 35%. Although, the chance to hit a character behind cover may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose and can be altered by certain {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, and effects.

A character hiding behind cover has a chance to avoid enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks. Full cover, indicated by a skull on the shield, reduce the chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the character by 60%. Partial cover reduces the chance to hit by 35%. Although, the chance to hit a character behind cover may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose and can be altered by certain {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, and effects.

languages.text: Ein Charakter, der sich hinter Deckung versteckt, hat die Chance feindlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriffen{/g} auszuweichen. Volle Deckung, die durch einen Totenkopf auf dem Schild angezeigt wird, verringert die Chance auf {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} für den Charakter um 60 %. Teilweise Deckung verringert die Trefferchance um 35 %. Die Chance, einen Charakter hinter einer Deckung zu treffen, kann je nach Schwierigkeitsgrad des Spiels variieren und durch bestimmte {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g} und Effekte verändert werden.
languages.original_text: A character hiding behind cover has a chance to avoid enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks. Full cover, indicated by a skull on the shield, reduce the chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the character by 60%. Partial cover reduces the chance to hit by 35%. Although, the chance to hit a character behind cover may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose and can be altered by certain {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, and effects.

traits.locale_text: Ein Charakter, der sich hinter {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}Deckung{/g} versteckt, hat die Chance gegnerischen {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfangriffen{/g} auszuweichen. Volle Deckung, die durch einen Totenkopf auf dem Schild angezeigt wird, verringert die Chance auf {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} für den Charakter um 60%. Teilweise Deckung verringert die Trefferchance um 35%. Die Chance, einen Charakter hinter einer Deckung zu treffen, kann je nach Schwierigkeitsgrad des Spiels variieren und durch bestimmte {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talente{/g} und Effekte verändert werden.

languages.text: Un personnage à couvert peut échapper aux attaques {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} des ennemis. Une couverture totale, représentée par un crâne sur le bouclier, réduit de 60 % le risque de subir un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g} pour le personnage, contre 35 % pour une couverture partielle. Toutefois, lorsque le personnage est à couvert, ce risque peut varier en fonction du niveau de difficulté choisi pour jeu, ainsi que des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} et effets utilisés.
languages.original_text: A character hiding behind cover has a chance to avoid enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks. Full cover, indicated by a skull on the shield, reduce the chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the character by 60%. Partial cover reduces the chance to hit by 35%. Although, the chance to hit a character behind cover may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose and can be altered by certain {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, and effects.

traits.locale_text: Un personnage {g|Encyclopedia:DetailsOfTheCoverGlossary}à couvert{/g} peut échapper aux attaques {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g} des ennemis. La couverture totale, représentée par une tête de mort sur le bouclier, réduit de 60 % le risque de subir un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} pour le personnage, contre 35 % pour une couverture partielle. Toutefois, lorsque le personnage est à couvert, ce risque peut varier en fonction du niveau de difficulté que vous choisissez dans le jeu, ainsi que des {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g} et effets utilisés.

languages.text: 躲在掩体后面的角色，有一定几率闪避敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击。 全身掩体以带有骷髅的盾牌表示，可以降低60%被{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的几率。半身掩体可以降低35%被命中的几率。根据游戏难度不同，攻击穿过掩体击中掩体后方角色的几率也会不同。此外，某些特定{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}与效果可以改变掩体的掩护效果。
languages.original_text: A character hiding behind cover has a chance to avoid enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks. Full cover, indicated by a skull on the shield, reduce the chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the character by 60%. Partial cover reduces the chance to hit by 35%. Although, the chance to hit a character behind cover may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose and can be altered by certain {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, and effects.

traits.locale_text: 躲在掩体后面的角色，有一定几率闪避敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}攻击。 全身掩体以带有骷髅的盾牌表示，可以降低60%被{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}的几率。半身掩体可以降低35%被命中的几率。根据游戏难度不同，攻击穿过掩体击中掩体后方角色的几率也会不同。此外，某些特定{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}与效果可以改变掩体的掩护效果。

languages.text: Un personaje protegido por cobertura tiene una probabilidad de evitar los ataques {g|Encyclopedia:Range}a distancia{/g} del enemigo. La cobertura completa, indicada con una calavera en el escudo, reduce la probabilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} en un 60 %. La cobertura parcial reduce la probabilidad de impacto en un 35 %. Sin embargo, la probabilidad de impactar a un personaje a cubierto puede variar en función de la dificultad del juego y ciertas {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talentos{/g} y efectos.
languages.original_text: A character hiding behind cover has a chance to avoid enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks. Full cover, indicated by a skull on the shield, reduce the chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the character by 60%. Partial cover reduces the chance to hit by 35%. Although, the chance to hit a character behind cover may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose and can be altered by certain {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, and effects.

traits.locale_text: Un personaje protegido por cobertura tiene una probabilidad de evitar los ataques a distancia del enemigo. La cobertura completa, indicada con una calavera en el escudo, reduce la probabilidad de impacto en un 60 %. La cobertura parcial reduce la probabilidad de impacto en un 35 %. Sin embargo, la probabilidad de impactar a un personaje a cubierto puede variar en función de la dificultad del juego y ciertas capacidades, talentos y efectos.

languages.original_text: A character hiding behind cover has a chance to avoid enemy ranged attacks. Full cover, indicated by a skull on the shield, reduce the chance to hit the character by 60%. Partial cover reduces the chance to hit by 35%. Although, the chance to hit a character behind cover may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose and can be altered by certain abilities, talents, and effects.

languages.text: 遮蔽物の後ろにいるキャラクターは敵の{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠距離{/g}攻撃を回避できる可能性がある。 ドクロのついたシールドで示されるフルカバーは、そのキャラクターに対する{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}率を60％減少させる。部分的カバーは命中率を35％減少させる。しかし、遮蔽物の後ろにいるキャラクターに命中する確率は、選択したゲームの難易度によって異なる場合があり、特定の{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}タレント{/g}および効果により変化する。
languages.original_text: A character hiding behind cover has a chance to avoid enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks. Full cover, indicated by a skull on the shield, reduce the chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the character by 60%. Partial cover reduces the chance to hit by 35%. Although, the chance to hit a character behind cover may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose and can be altered by certain {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, and effects.

traits.locale_text: 遮蔽物の後ろにいるキャラクターは敵の遠距離攻撃を回避できる可能性がある。 ドクロのついたシールドで示されるフルカバーは、そのキャラクターに対する命中率を60％減少させる。部分的カバーは命中率を35％減少させる。しかし、遮蔽物の後ろにいるキャラクターに命中する確率は、選択したゲームの難易度によって異なる場合があり、特定のアビリティ、タレントおよび効果により変化する。

languages.text: Siper arkasında saklanan bir karakterin, düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:Range}menzilli{/g} saldırılarından sakınma olasılığı bulunur. Kalkan üzerine kafatası ile gösterilen tam siper, karakterin {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurulma{/g} olasılığını %60 azaltır. Kısmi siper ise vurulma olasılığını %35 azaltır. Bununla birlikte siper arkasındaki bir karakteri vurabilme olasılığı; oyunun seçtiğin zorluk seviyesine, belirli bazı {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}beceri{/g} ve etkilere bağlı olarak da değişebilir.
languages.original_text: A character hiding behind cover has a chance to avoid enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} attacks. Full cover, indicated by a skull on the shield, reduce the chance to {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} the character by 60%. Partial cover reduces the chance to hit by 35%. Although, the chance to hit a character behind cover may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose and can be altered by certain {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talents{/g}, and effects.
